trans-unit.source: Associates cancellation logic, in the form of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, with a main path of execution, also expressed as a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Associe la logique d'annulation, sous la forme d'une <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, à un chemin d'accès principal d'exécution, également exprimé sous la forme d'une <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> that represents the main path of execution.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'<see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contenue par le <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> qui représente le chemin d'accès principal d'exécution.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> that is executed in the event of cancellation.
Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la collection d'objets <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> associés au <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Collection des objets <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> associés au <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
